results.title: [Farmyard follies]
results.brief_description: A collection of back-to-back “old-time hillbilly favourites” sung by singers in “hillbilly” costume. Songs include: “I Love Mountain Music”, “I Sold My Saddle for an Old Guitar” plus routines.
results.description: A collection of back-to-back “old-time hillbilly favourites” sung by singers in “hillbilly” costume. Songs include: “I Love Mountain Music”, “I Sold My Saddle for an Old Guitar” plus routines.

results.title: [Fanfare shorts]
results.brief_description: A showreel anthology of animated advertisements and public service films from the early to mid 1960’s. Zippy and sophisticated animation at the service of commerce and public education. These cartoons provide a facinating insight into the social and cultural mores of ‘60’s Australia.
results.description: A showreel anthology of animated advertisements and public service films from the early to mid 1960’s. Zippy and sophisticated animation at the service of commerce and public education. These cartoons provide a facinating insight into the social and cultural mores of ‘60’s Australia.
description_for_label: A showreel anthology of animated advertisements and public service films from the early to mid 1960’s. Zippy and sophisticated animation at the service of commerce and public education. These cartoons provide a facinating insight into the social and cultural mores of ‘60’s Australia.
